item.title: Creating My Personal Website with Hugo and Netlify
item.description: Creating a personal website has never been easier with the plethora of tools available today. In this blog post, Iâ€™ll walk you through how I built my website using Hugo, a fast and flexible static site generator, and the Hugo Profile theme. I then hosted my website on Netlify using GitHub for version control. Choosing Hugo and the Hugo Profile Theme I chose Hugo because of its speed and ease of use.
